entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 10:56 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
